title: Francesca of Lost Nation
description: Winner of Four Literary Awards Francesca of Lost Nation is the story of a 59-year old woman and her granddaughter, Sarah, during the summer of 1947 in Lost Nation, Iowa. Together, these best friends beard an arsonist in his den, conquer the skies and demonstrate to one another the greatest truth about love. Join Lucinda Sue and all the quirky characters of Lost Nation, Iowa and discover one terrific read!
author: Lucinda Sue Crosby
